TopicTitle: Mod that locks or freezes ship in space, similar to Airpark but for ships in orbit?

Articles.Content: Hello. I am looking for a mod that allows me to freeze a ship in orbit. I want to make a movie and use the ships as anchor points for the cameras. But if the ships are in orbit, they drift away from each other. The mod Airpark allows this, but it doesn't work outside the atmosphere. Is there a mod similar to it that will work for ships in orbit? Thanks.

On 7/28/2019 at 2:16 PM, SP112 said:

Well one way to do it would be to use KSPIE Alcubier drive and balance Exotic Matter in maintain altitude mode, which will create enough antigravity to stay fixed at a location above a celestrail body
